pageProduct.name: Avene Antirougeurs Clean Soothing Cleansing Lotion 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Antirougeurs Redness-Relief Refreshing Cleansing Lotion is a no-rinse cleanser formulated to respect the sensitivity of redness-prone skin by soothing the skin as it gently cleanses and removes impurities. Thanks to its “gentle-fresh” texture, it makes the skin feel fresh and comfortable immediately. The unique formula of the Redness-Relief Refreshing Cleansing Lotion is made up of three key ingredients that help soothe heat sensations caused by redness:

  • Avène Thermal Spring Water: naturally soothing and anti-irritating 
  • TRP-Regulin: relieves sensations of discomfort and improves the tolerance threshold of sensitive skin
  • Pongamia oil: helps maintain proper balance in the skin’s ecosystem

Fragrance free, alcohol free and paraben free, the formula is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.
Apply morning and evening with a cotton pad or with fingertips by massaging in light circular movements. Tissue off gently without rubbing.

Common Uses

For sensitive skin prone to redness

Ingredients

Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Poloxamer 188. 4-T-Butylcyclohexanol. Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer. Benzoic Acid. C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside. C14-22 Alcohols. Carbomer. Chlorphenesin. Disodium Edta. Octyldodecanol. Pongamia Glabra Seed Oil. Sodium Hydroxide.

Directions

Apply morning and evening with a cotton pad or with fingertips by massaging in light circular movements. Tissue off gently without rubbing. Rinse with a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water, which will complement the soothing effect of the Antirougeurs Redness-Relief Refreshing Cleansing Lotion. Follow with Antirougeurs Fort Relief Concentrate on localised areas of redness.
